entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] LineBreakMode doesn't work on Button #9277
  • Reusable / extendable version of SecureStorage? (and for that matter - other relevant packages as well) #9276
  • Grid rows within CollectionView are all blank (only in Release mode) #9275
  • FlexLayout not rendering content #9274
  • Title view not displayed after navigating shell tabs #9269
  • .SVG files not showing up on IOS #9265
  • Date format DatePicker wrong in Windows #9255
    Backlog
  • PanGestureRecognizer Disables Item Selection In CollectionView #9253
    Backlog

Closed

  • Explore removing resource copy into memory for .NET MAUI Blazor WebView on Windows #9206
    7.0-rc1
  • Deal with the scenario of a handler on a virtual view being set to a new handler. #8456
    .NET 7
  • Label, wrapping text, doesn't center. #9030
  • Shell navigation throws System.ArgumentException: 'Ambiguous routes matched for: ... error #9041
  • ScrollView content with Buttons rendered offscreen do not respond on iOS/MacCatalyst #9236
  • <option> list not updating their position upon window position change, but does so on window refocus #9268
  • [WinUI] `OnAppearing` is called each time the application window is selected (switching windows apps) #9246
  • TLS 1.2 in android option (it does not exists in VS Preview 17.1) #5604
  • No RelativeLayout in MAUI #9256
  • Pair to Mac fail with Error: Could not find ‘.NET Core SDK ‘ with version = 6.0.400-preview.22301.10 #9132

PullRequests

Created

  • Propagate semantic properties from FlyoutItem #9270
  • Fix NullRef in XAML ConvertTo method for AppThemeBindingExtension #9266
  • Bump xunit.runner.utility from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9258
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Stop copying content stream in .NET MAUI Blazor Windows #9254
    area/blazor 🕸️, 7.0-rc1, 7.0-rc1
  • Combined Dependabot androidx PR's #9267
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Tizen.UIExtensions.ElmSharp from 0.8.1 to 0.9.0 #9207
  • Disconnect old handler after setting new handler #8781
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Lifecycle.LiveData from 2.5.0 to 2.5.1 #9259
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.0 to 2.5.1 #9260
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.5.0 to 2.5.1 #9261
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.MediaRouter from 1.3.0.1 to 1.3.1 #9262
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Runtime from 2.5.0 to 2.5.1 #9263
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.UI from 2.5.0 to 2.5.1 #9264
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [VisualDiagnostics] Allow RegisterSourceInfo to update existing targets #8947
    partner/ui-tools
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9225
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update repro.md #9226
    community ✨

Updated

  • WIP: Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    do-not-merge, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Simplify ShellItem Parenting #9221
    area/shell 🐢
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, .NET 7 Planning
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Add props file that allows us to easily isolate to a single TFM #9195
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix [Android] CollectionView EmptyView SelectionMode=Single on Android #9215
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Implement SkiaImage Save #9125
    area/drawing ✏️, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Avoid create an unnecessary dialog in DatePickerHandler #8561
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-servicing
